column3: I've seen more inspirational public artwork, but this one is nice. Stop and get a photo. Have some coffee nearby.
Great bit of modern art in the middle of Rodeo Drive. Definitely worth stopping to admire up close if you can.

The Torso, which stands in the middle of Rodeo Drive is an eye-catcher for those who see it for the first time.Standing 14 feet tall, this sculpture is one of the last works of art from the late artist, Robert Graham.It is the symbol of style on Rodeo Drive.George Vreeland Hill
